questions.question: She ___ finished her homework.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数なので has finished です。

questions.question: They ___ completed the project.
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので have completed です。

questions.question: He ___ lost his keys again.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数なので has lost です。

questions.question: I ___ seen that movie twice.
questions.explanation: 一人称単数は have seen です。

questions.question: Lisa ___ just called you.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数なので has called です。

questions.question: The students ___ cleaned the classroom already.
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので have cleaned です。

questions.question: My brother ___ broken his smartphone.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数なので has broken です。

questions.question: We ___ visited the museum before.
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので have visited です。

questions.question: The train ___ left the station.
questions.explanation: 単数主語なので has left です。

questions.question: You ___ improved a lot this year.
questions.explanation: You には have が続きます。

questions.question: Emma ___ never eaten sushi.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数です。

questions.question: They ___ just arrived at the airport.
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので have arrived です。

questions.question: The teacher ___ given us extra homework.
questions.explanation: 単数主語なので has given です。

questions.question: My grandparents ___ lived here for decades.
questions.explanation: 複数主語 have lived です。

questions.question: He ___ written three novels.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数です。

questions.question: Our team ___ won the match.
questions.explanation: team は単数扱いで has won です。

questions.question: We ___ been friends since childhood.
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので have been です。

questions.question: The cat ___ caught another mouse.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数です。

questions.question: I ___ finished reading the book.
questions.explanation: I には have finished です。

questions.question: They ___ forgotten the password.
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので have forgotten です。

questions.question: She ___ finished the report yet.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数の否定形は hasn't です。

questions.question: They ___ decided on a theme.
questions.explanation: 複数主語の否定は haven't です。

questions.question: He ___ visited the art museum yet.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数の否定は hasn't です。

questions.question: I ___ seen the new episode.
questions.explanation: I の否定は haven't seen です。

questions.question: The bus ___ arrived yet.
questions.explanation: 単数主語の否定は hasn't arrived です。

questions.question: We ___ heard from him recently.
questions.explanation: 複数主語の否定は haven't heard です。

questions.question: My sister ___ done her chores yet.
questions.explanation: 三人称単数です。

questions.question: The students ___ finished the test.
questions.explanation: 複数主語 haven't finished です。

questions.question: It ___ stopped raining yet.
questions.explanation: 単数主語 hasn't stopped です。

questions.question: You ___ answered my question.
questions.explanation: You の否定は haven't answered です。

questions.question: We have lived in Tokyo ___ five years.
questions.explanation: 期間を表すので for です。

questions.question: She has known him ___ elementary school.
questions.explanation: 起点を表すので since です。

questions.question: I have studied piano ___ 2018.
questions.explanation: 開始時点なので since です。

questions.question: They have been friends ___ childhood.
questions.explanation: 起点を表す since を使います。

questions.question: He has worked here ___ a long time.
questions.explanation: 期間を表す for です。

questions.question: My parents have been married ___ twenty-five years.
questions.explanation: 期間 for twenty-five years。

questions.question: Our club has practiced ___ last month.
questions.explanation: 起点 since last month。

questions.question: The shop has been closed ___ Monday.
questions.explanation: since Monday です。

questions.question: We have had this car ___ three years.
questions.explanation: 期間を表す for です。

questions.question: She has played the violin ___ she was six.
questions.explanation: 過去の時点以来 since を用います。

questions.question: I have waited ___ two hours.
questions.explanation: 期間を表す for two hours。

questions.question: The festival has continued ___ many years.
questions.explanation: 期間を表す for です。

questions.question: He has collected stamps ___ he was a child.
questions.explanation: 起点 since he was a child。

questions.question: They have stayed in Kyoto ___ a week.
questions.explanation: 期間 for a week。

questions.question: We have known each other ___ junior high.
questions.explanation: 起点 since junior high。

questions.question: My dog has lived with us ___ 2012.
questions.explanation: since 2012 です。

questions.question: She has practiced calligraphy ___ months.
questions.explanation: 期間 for months。

questions.question: The company has existed ___ 1970.
questions.explanation: since 1970 です。

questions.question: He has not eaten meat ___ five years.
questions.explanation: 期間を表す for five years。

questions.question: I have used this app ___ last spring.
questions.explanation: 起点 since last spring。

questions.question: I have ___ finished my homework.
questions.explanation: 肯定文で「すでに」は already です。

questions.question: She has ___ gotten home.
questions.explanation: 直前を表す just を使います。

questions.question: Have you eaten dinner ___?
questions.explanation: 疑問文では yet を使います。

questions.question: They haven't arrived ___.
questions.explanation: 否定文では yet を用います。

questions.question: We have ___ started the game.
questions.explanation: just で「ちょうど」です。

questions.question: He has ___ cleaned his room.
questions.explanation: 肯定文の「もう〜した」は already。

questions.question: Have they ___ seen the announcement?
questions.explanation: 疑問文でも already を使えます。

questions.question: I haven't read that book ___.
questions.explanation: 否定文で yet。

questions.question: She has ___ left for the airport.
questions.explanation: 肯定文で already。

questions.question: The train has ___ departed.
questions.explanation: 直前なら just。

questions.question: Have you ___ finished the report?
questions.explanation: 進行中か確認する表現です。

questions.question: They have ___ opened the new shop.
questions.explanation: 最近起こったことには just。

questions.question: We haven't decided the title ___.
questions.explanation: 否定文で yet。

questions.question: My brother has ___ washed the dishes.
questions.explanation: 既に終わった so already。

questions.question: Has the movie started ___?
questions.explanation: 疑問文で yet。

questions.question: She hasn't emailed me ___.
questions.explanation: 否定文で yet。

questions.question: The teacher has ___ explained the rules.
questions.explanation: 肯定文で already。

questions.question: I have ___ visited that museum.
questions.explanation: 既に訪問済み。

questions.question: He has ___ returned from the trip.
questions.explanation: 直前 just。

questions.question: Have you called him ___?
questions.explanation: 疑問文で yet。

questions.question: Have you ___ visited Okinawa?
questions.explanation: 経験を尋ねる疑問文では ever。

questions.question: She has ___ climbed a mountain.
questions.explanation: 経験がない場合は never。

questions.question: I have ___ tried natto before.
questions.explanation: 「一度もない」は never。

questions.question: Have they ___ seen a shooting star?
questions.explanation: 経験を尋ねるので ever。

questions.question: He has ___ been abroad.
questions.explanation: 経験ゼロは never。

questions.question: Have you ___ heard this song?
questions.explanation: 経験の有無を尋ねる表現です。

questions.question: We have ___ visited Kyoto many times.
questions.explanation: すでに何度も訪れたので already。

questions.question: She has ___ met a famous actor.
questions.explanation: 経験がないので never。

questions.question: Has he ___ tried skiing?
questions.explanation: 経験を尋ねるので ever。

questions.question: They have ___ gone camping in winter.
questions.explanation: 経験がないので never。

questions.question: Tom has ___ London; he'll be back tomorrow.
questions.explanation: 戻ってくる場合は has been to を使います。

questions.question: Lisa has ___ the supermarket and hasn't returned yet.
questions.explanation: まだ戻っていない場合は has gone to です。

questions.question: Have you ever ___ Hokkaido?
questions.explanation: 訪れた経験は have been to です。

questions.question: My parents have ___ Kyoto many times.
questions.explanation: 訪問経験を表す been to。

questions.question: He has ___ the library to return some books.
questions.explanation: まだ戻っていないので has gone to。

questions.question: They have ___ Spain twice.
questions.explanation: 訪問経験を表す been to。

questions.question: Our teacher has ___ Osaka for a meeting.
questions.explanation: 現在不在なら has gone to。

questions.question: I have ___ that museum before.
questions.explanation: 経験を表す been to。

questions.question: She has ___ the dentist and will be late.
questions.explanation: 現在いないので has gone to。

questions.question: Have they ___ Europe?
questions.explanation: 経験を尋ねるので been to。

questions.question: ___ you finished your homework yet?
questions.explanation: 主語が you なので Have で始めます。

questions.question: ___ she ever been to Australia?
questions.explanation: 三人称単数なので Has。

questions.question: How long ___ you lived here?
questions.explanation: you に続く助動詞は have です。

questions.question: Where ___ he gone?
questions.explanation: he に合わせて has gone?

questions.question: ___ they already eaten?
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので Have です。

questions.question: ___ your sister taken the exam yet?
questions.explanation: 三人称単数なので Has。

questions.question: What ___ you done for the festival?
questions.explanation: you なので have done。

questions.question: Why ___ he missed so many classes?
questions.explanation: 三人称単数で has missed。

questions.question: ___ your friends arrived yet?
questions.explanation: 複数主語なので Have arrived。

questions.question: How many books ___ you read this year?
questions.explanation: you の疑問文で have。
